title: Bernardo Silva: Manchester City complete £43m deal for Monaco midfielder

author: talkSPORT
description: Manchester City have announced the signing of Monaco playmaker Bernardo Silva. It is understood City will pay £43million for the 22-year-old, who will officially move on July 1. It means City have won the race for the Portugal international ahead of neighbours Manchester United, who were also interested in him. The player flew into Manchester Airport on Thursday night and negotiations were swiftly concluded.
title: CONFIRMED: Manchester City clinch £43million Bernardo Silva signing from Monaco

description: Der portugiesische Fußball-Nationalspieler Bernardo Silva wechselt vom französischen Meister AS Monaco zu Manchester City in die englische Premier League. Das gab der Verein des früheren Bayern-Trainers Pep Guardiola bekannt.
title: Fußball: Millionen-Transfer: Silva wechselt von Monaco zu Man City
